https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xgVxmbD4mLtvelP8U5jbT7Rxjiv.jpg Inspired by the picturesque paintings of Thomas Kinkade, The Christmas Cottage tells the semi-autobiographical tale of how a young boy is propelled to launch a career as an artist after he learns that his mother is in danger of losing the family home. Christmas Cottage
